config.title: Talks and Workshops
config.subtitle: I enjoy sharing what I know. I have experience giving talks on different technical and product-related topics, as well as conducting workshops. I've organized a technical workshop sponsored by Github and volunteered on various tech and entrepreneurship events.

callToAction.claim: Do you have an event and want jorge to be a speaker or co-organiser? Write an email or contact.

pastTalks.title: Introducing Redis by Jorge Ferreiro - NoSQL database course at UCM
pastTalks.summary: Introduced Redis, a key-value NoSQL database, to 30 college students. I talked about introductory concepts and features, and shared a practical case.

pastTalks.title: Dailyfocus presentation (with DEMO! ðŸ”¥): 16 minutes - FDI UCM - #helloDailyfocus
pastTalks.summary: Presentation of my personal project Dailyfocus, where I explained the engineering, product design, business and my personal experience.

pastTalks.title: Dailyfocus presentation (June 2017): Vision, product, tech and journey.
pastTalks.summary: Presentation made for an academic jury from my college. I mainly cover: Challenges, vision and goals, development process, lessons learned, etc.

pastTalks.title: Mini talk - Dailyfocus at #JsDayEs 2017 - Jorge Ferreiro
pastTalks.summary: Brief introduction of Dailyfocus at JSDayEs (JavaScript event in Spain). Challenged by the organizer to prepare it in 5 minutes.

pastTalks.title: Workshop: Your first professional website (sponsored by Github.com)
pastTalks.summary: I organized and ran this workshop for more than 50 students in my college. I taught the attendees how to create a professional website from scratch to deployment.

pastTalks.title: Machine Learning: online news prediction in Mashable
pastTalks.summary: As a college project, I created a presentation and a report with a ML analysis to predict when is the best time to publish news to gain popularity.

pastTalks.title: Webapps: introduction and publishing on Firefox OS
pastTalks.summary: I was invited to a Firefox OS meetup to talk about: Webapps, how to create them and my experience creating Music4deejays, a streaming music app.
